text: Soni (kumbuchilani) katema katwajigele chilanga chawanache wa Israila chanti: “Ngamun'galagatilaga jwalijose ikaweje Allah, ni mwatendeleje yambone achinangolo, wapaulongo, wawina ni masikini, soni m'becheteje ni wandu yambone chenene, soni jimikani Swala mwakolosya nikutolaga Zaka.” Kaneka mwagalawiche (nikuchitundumalila chilangachi) ikaweje wannono mwa jenumanja, aku nchisyululaga
